item.title: Suica so far in October
item.description: 16:05 Sunday 22 October 2017 JST Not sure if I should put this online, but I think anyone who cares can get the info in other ways, so here is link to a doc which has aa backup of my Suica info https://docs.google.com/document/d/18iviJj_fnekTNBPaWQp9aXLCuYMLV-aDKl8KJVyPC-Q/edit

item.title: money tracker
item.description: 21:35 Thursday 19 October 2017 JST file:///Users/thunderrabbit/shizzle.html?t1=717&c1=start&t2=10717&c2=add%20money%2016%20Oct&t3=15717&c3=add%20money%2016%20Oct&t4=19717&c4=add%20money%2016%20Oct&t5=19306&c5=Noborito%20to%20Otemachi%2017%20Oct&t6=19141&c6=Nihonbashi%20to%20Hiroo%2017%20Oct&t7=18848&c7=food%20and%20drink%2017%20Oct&t8=18467&c8=Nogizaka%20to%20Noborito%2017%20Oct&t9=18165&c9=Noborito%20to%20Kawasaki%2018%20Oct&t10=17959&c10=bus%20Kawasaki%20to%20JB%2018%20Oct&t11=17753&c11=bus%20JB%20to%20Kawasaki%2018%20Oct&t12=17451&c12=Kawasaki%20to%20Noborito%2018%20Oct&t13=17149&c13=Noborito%20to%20Kawasaki%2019%20Oct&t14=16761&c14=Kawasaki%20to%20Akihabara%2019%20Oct&t15=16596&c15=Akihabara%20to%20Shinjuku%2019%20Oct&t16=16349&c16=Shinjuku%20to%20Noborito%2019%20Oct&mode=0&fs3=1&ft2=1&f3t1=1&f4t0=1&d=:&o1=1&fps= I know you cannot use this, but I will make it a webpage sometime “soon” 15:40 Friday 20 October 2017 JST Okay here is a version you can use https://thunderrabbit.github.io/balance-differ/?t1=717&c1=start&t2=10717&c2=add%20money%2016%20Oct&t3=15717&c3=add%20money%2016%20Oct&t4=19717&c4=add%20money%2016%20Oct&t5=19306&c5=Noborito%20to%20Otemachi%2017%20Oct&t6=19141&c6=Nihonbashi%20to%20Hiroo%2017%20Oct&t7=18848&c7=food%20and%20drink%2017%20Oct&t8=18467&c8=Nogizaka%20to%20Noborito%2017%20Oct&t9=18165&c9=Noborito%20to%20Kawasaki%2018%20Oct&t10=17959&c10=bus%20Kawasaki%20to%20JB%2018%20Oct&t11=17753&c11=bus%20JB%20to%20Kawasaki%2018%20Oct&t12=17451&c12=Kawasaki%20to%20Noborito%2018%20Oct&t13=17149&c13=Noborito%20to%20Kawasaki%2019%20Oct&t14=16761&c14=Kawasaki%20to%20Akihabara%2019%20Oct&t15=16596&c15=Akihabara%20to%20Shinjuku%2019%20Oct&t16=16349&c16=Shinjuku%20to%20Noborito%2019%20Oct&mode=0&fs3=1&ft2=1&f3t1=1&f4t0=1&d=:&o1=1&fps= Basically, I enter the balances of my Suica card in order and the script calculates the difference between the balances, so I can enter the differences into my budget tracking software. The script is basically a slight modification of https://www.
